SEARCH

Package com.example.lottary.ui.browse

package com.example.lottary.ui.browse
  • Class
    Description
    BrowseActivity
    BrowseActivity Role / Purpose: - The entry point of the "Browse" tab.
    BrowseEventsAdapter
    RecyclerView adapter for the "Browse" list.
    BrowseEventsAdapter.Listener
    Minimal callback surface for the host (fragment/activity) to react to user actions.
    BrowseEventsAdapter.VH
    ViewHolder for a single event card.
    BrowseListFragment
    BrowseListFragment Role / Purpose: - Displays a scrollable list of events for the Browse tab using a RecyclerView.
    EventDetailsActivity
    EventDetailsActivity Displays a single event's details and lets the user join the waiting list (after acknowledging lottery policy).
    EventQrScannerActivity
    EventQrScannerActivity Purpose: - Open camera, scan a QR code generated by QrScanActivity (or any generic QR app) on another device.
    FilterBottomSheet
    FilterBottomSheet Purpose / Role: - Presents a modal bottom sheet that lets the user configure filter options for the Browse list: - Open events only - Geolocation-enabled events only - From / To date range (yyyy-MM-dd) - Coarse type buckets (Sports, Music, Arts invalid input: '&' Crafts, Market) Lifecycle invalid input: '&' Contract: - Use FilterBottomSheet.newInstance(FilterOptions, Listener) to pass current defaults and a callback.
    FilterBottomSheet.Listener
    Callback interface used to deliver the final options back to the host.
    FilterOptions
    FilterOptions Purpose / Role: - A simple, parcelable container that holds all filter criteria used by the Browse screen.
    LotteryPolicyDialogFragment
    LotteryPolicyDialogFragment Purpose: - Presents the "Lottery policy" confirmation UI as a dialog.
    LotteryPolicyDialogFragment.Listener
    Host callback interface.
    LotteryPolicyPrefs
    LotteryPolicyPrefs Purpose: - Tiny SharedPreferences helper to remember whether the user has accepted the lottery policy ("Don't ask again" state).
    QrScanActivity
    QrScanActivity (现在实际作用是：选择一个活动并生成对应的二维码).
    QrScanActivity.EventsAdapter
    Adapter that shows the list of events and forwards clicks to a listener.
    QrScanActivity.EventsAdapter.Listener
     
    QrScanActivity.EventViewHolder
    ViewHolder for a simple row containing an event title.
